burn(uint256).details: Burns `tokenId`. See {ERC721-_burn}. Requirements: - The caller must own `tokenId` or be an approved operator.

contractURI().details: Link to Contract metadata https://docs.opensea.io/docs/contract-level-metadata TODO: add contract metadata

params.tokenId: index of the NFT bought in the auction

mintForAuction(address,string).details: Safely mints a token to an address with a tokenURI.

params.creator: this will likely be pr1s0n.art, but may be others in the future. Included here for proper attribution.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.data: data which reads 'no buyer' to add to token's transactional history for completeness.
params.tokenId: index of the NFT bought in the auction

params._tokenId: - the NFT asset queried for royalty information
params._value: - the sale price of the NFT asset specified by _tokenId

returns.receiver: - address of who should be sent the royalty payment
returns.royaltyAmount: - the royalty payment amount for value sale price

params.recipient: the royalties recipient - will always be pr1s0nart, for regulatory reasons.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.data: URI to receipt metadata that will be added to the NFT TODO: is it an issue that we store the receipt uri in bytes and the metadata uri above as a string?

freeze(address,uint256).notice: called when an auction is settled, sets the frozenToken struct.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Override isApprovedForAll to whitelist user's OpenSea proxy accounts to enable gas-less listings.

mintForAuction(address,string).notice: this mints the NFT to this contract so that we can ensure only the buyer can receive the first transfer and         prove contractually that no-one else can.

returnToPA(uint256,bytes).notice: called when there is no buyer for an auction

setRoyalties(address,uint256).notice: Set the royalties for the whole contract. Our intention is to set it to 10% in perpetuity.

transferToBuyer(uint256,bytes).notice: sends 'frozen' NFT to the winning bidder by attaching the receipt. Protected only to ensure no random         data is uploaded on the transfer.
